title: Crunchy Mini Stand N Stuff Shells
ingredients: 12 Mini Stand N Stuff Taco Shells
1/2 cup sour cream or vegan alternative
1/2 cup shredded cheese or vegan cheese
instructions: Preheat oven to 180°C and warm the taco shells according to package instructions.
Cook the planted.chicken crispy in olive oil for 5-6 minutes until golden and crispy.
Season with taco seasoning and break into smaller pieces.
Arrange warm taco shells on a serving platter.
Layer each shell with lettuce, planted.chicken, tomatoes, cheese, and sour cream.
Top with pickled jalapeños and fresh cilantro, serve immediately.
